backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that includes a blob storage mixin and exposes a `getQuotes` query returning a hardcoded list of three humorous philosophical quotes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features—retry logic in `useGetQuotes` and skeleton-during-retry behavior in `QuotesPage.tsx`—to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for the project's frontend structure and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point titled 'Cash's Famous Philosophy' that mounts the React app into a `#root` div via `src/main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders `QuotesPage` inside an `ErrorBoundary` and always displays a `Footer` with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Class-based React error boundary that catches render errors and displays a themed fallback UI with a 'Try again' button to reset the error state.
frontend/src/components/QuoteCard.tsx: Presentational component that renders a single `Quote` as a styled card with decorative quotation marks, a numbered badge, accent symbols, and wobble animation.
frontend/src/components/QuoteCardSkeleto: Loading placeholder component that renders skeleton blocks styled to match the `QuoteCard` layout while quotes are being fetched.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status derived from `@dfinity/auth-client`.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook `useGetQuotes` that fetches quotes from the backend actor with 3 retries and exponential backoff (up to 30s) to handle intermittent failures.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Zilla Slab, Caveat), sets up Tailwind directives, defines a warm earthy OKLCH color palette via CSS variables, and adds utility classes for fonts, card wobble animations, and quote cycling transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/QuotesPage.tsx: Page component that fetches and displays cycling philosophical quotes with fade transitions, dot indicators, and skeleton/error states; shows skeleton during loading/retries and only shows the error UI after all retries are exhausted.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens (amber, cream, espresso, sidebar, chart), slab/handwritten font families, border radius variants, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the app (cycling quotes display), tracking two implemented features—auto-retry with exponential backoff in useGetQuotes and skeleton-during-retry behavior in QuotesPage—to fix intermittent mobile quote loading failures.
